answers.answer: Hi Mikey,Diabetes is really a condition with a steep learning curve.  Are you able to find some other young people with type 1 through your dr?Low carb and learning how to manage your diabetes / properly inject insulin is really important.  i will recommend the book "Think Like A Pancreas".  You may also go to Bernstein Diabetes University on Utube.  Dr. Bernstein is a really old guy (in his early 80s now), his lectures on utube teach about diabetes and it's management.  Please check your in messages.

question: I am 14 years old, and I have had diabetes for a year now. My glucose count has been erratic and out of control often.  I have not been very good at monitoring my count or monitoring my carb intake.  I'm just beginning to understand how serious my condition is.  I'm looking for other people my age who have struggled with this.  I want to do better, but I need help.
title: I'm new here...I need help
